creator: joerg.broesamle@alcatel.de
text:
Running an application with log4j Version 1.1b5 exits with the follwing
error message:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: 
sun/misc/InvalidJarIndexException
        at org.apache.log4j.Category.<clinit>(Category.java:136)
        at pctEldas_T.BroadcastTest.<clinit>(BroadcastTest.java:23)
make: *** [runBroadcastTest] Error 1

When I use version 1.0.4 all works fine.

I have a log4j.properties file in the CLASSPATH. But it looks like this
configuration file is not found. I call PropertyConfigurator.configure()
in the main method.
It looks like there is a getResource call in the Category.java file (line 136)
which is called in a catch block. I think this call should be in it's own
try-catch block.

creator: bugzilla@apache.org
text: This is fixed in 1.1b6. Thank you.
